effect.x_y: For five turns, prevents all Pokémon on the ground from sleeping and strengthens their electric moves to 1.5× their power. Changes nature power to thunderbolt.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: For five turns, prevents all Pokémon on the ground from sleeping and strengthens their electric moves to 1.5× their power. Changes nature power to thunderbolt.

short_effect.x_y: For five turns, prevents all Pokémon on the ground from sleeping and strengthens their electric moves to 1.5× their power.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: For five turns, prevents all Pokémon on the ground from sleeping and strengthens their electric moves to 1.5× their power.

flavor_text.x_y: The user electrifies the ground under everyone’s feet for five turns. Pokémon on the ground no longer fall asleep.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user electrifies the ground under everyone’s feet for five turns. Pokémon on the ground no longer fall asleep.
